name: The European Intelligent Cash Protection Association
goal: EURICPA represents the leading European manufacturers of intelligent solutions for secure cash transportation and storage. The Association is made up of manufacturers of solutions covering the full range of secure cash transportation by neutralisation technologies using an indelible dye and have significant activity on the European Markets, and solutions or services providers in the security of valuables and cash-in-transit area: universities, educational institutions, governments, public laboratories or non-profit organisations. Associate Members have an interest to stay abreast of the cash-in-transit smart industry and to benefit from the association’s expertise and global activity.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Cash in Transit Regulation
- Cash limitations / restrictions
